channel.title: Success Stories :: Melio Consulting
channel.description: See how Melio AI has successfully helped organisations in building impactful solutions.

item.title: Improving data scientist productivity by 80%
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Hello with the implementation of an end-to-end machine learning platform “ Fluid has simplified out model building and deployment process, and allowed for integration across our various platforms ” Rainer Schilder - Lead Data Scientist Case Study Industry

item.title: Retail and business banking rolling forecast
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Hello for the budgeting process with what-if analysis scenario planning “ What-if analysis lets my team help our business partners achieve their financial goals ” Head of Retail Banking - Quote is paraphrased Case Study Industry

item.title: Time savings for finance team on monthly financial reporting automation
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Hello with Microsoft AX Dynamics “ The solution saves me a lot of time every month and we look forward to expand it to rest of the business ” Finance Manager - Quote is paraphrased Case Study Industry

item.title: Optimising debt collection efforts for over 1 million cases
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Hello with the implementation of a cloud-based debt prioritisation solution “ The solution helped us to work the right cases first and reduce the time taken to work a case by more than 50% ” Head of Debtors Shared Services - Quote is paraphrased Case Study Industry

item.title: Leveraging Azure Machine Learning to improve billing accuracy and consistency
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Hello “ This is the beginning of how we will change the way we work with data ” GM - Pharmacy Case Study Industry

item.title: Helping clients adopt AWS best practices in cloud architecture and design

item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Hello “The sessions felt like a lighthouse, shining a significant light on our roadmap and our future. We enjoyed the business & product focus.” Co-founder - Digital Service Marketplace Case Study Industry
